content: round 8 st trapping the round 9 chain-6 x 12 placing the last slip_stitch in the first slip_stitch to join finish off 12 mccl 12 slip_stitch round 11 join yarn b with a slip_stitch in the marked double_crochet of round 8 enclosing the round 10 slip_stitch chain 3 long double_crochet in same st working in the round 9 chain-3 spaces behind the clusters 3 double_crochet in next chain-3 3 double_crochet in next chain-3 2 long double_crochet in round 8 double_crochet between clusters x 11 3 double_crochet in next chain-3 3 double_crochet in next chain space slip_stitch to top of starting chain to join 96 double_crochet round 12 slip_stitch into next st chain 3 double_crochet in same st double_crochet in each of next 3 st dct double_crochet in next st double_crochet in each of next 3 st 2 double_crochet in next st x 11 double_crochet in each of next 3 st dct double_crochet in next st double_crochet in each of next 3 st slip_stitch to top of starting chain to join 120 double_crochet round 13 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in each of next 4 st half_double_crochet in each of next 5 st double_crochet in each of next 5 st skip st check the skipped stitch should be a dct chain 2 double_crochet in each of next 5 st half_double_crochet in each of next 5 st single_crochet in each of next 9 st half_double_crochet in each of next 5 st double_crochet in each of next 5 st x 3 skip st chain 2 double_crochet in each of next 5 st half_double_crochet in each of next 5 st single_crochet in each of next 4 st sl st to 1st single_crochet to join do not finish off place loop on stitch holder at front of work 36 single_crochet 40 half_double_crochet 40 double_crochet 4 chain-2 in rounds 14 and 15 slip stitches are used to carry the yarn from corner to corner invisibly be careful not to pull them too tight and buckle your work you may decide to work the corners separately finishing off after each repeat and omitting the slip stitching this will of course result in a lot of ends to sew in round 14 using yarn c slip_stitch into bbo of 3rd double_crochet before a corner chain-2 chain 3 skip 2 double_crochet working in front of round 13 puff in skipped round 12 double_crochet chain 3 skip 2 double_crochet slip_stitch in back bar of each of next 25 st x 4 last slip_stitch being placed in the first slip_stitch to join finish off 100 slip_stitch 4 puffs 8 chain-3 © 2018 lettice rose away with the fairies afghan square page 3 of 4 round 15 the mccl here are formed stitching into the five corner stitches with yarn a starting in a round 13 double_crochet 2 st before a corner puff form an mccl slip_stitch in each of next 25 round 14 slip_stitch mccl over next 5 round 13 sts x 3 slip_stitch in next 25 round 14
